Canola oil and Breast Cancer

Summary generated using: $shovel3 query.concatConclusions 'breast cancer canola oil site:ncbi.nlm.nih.gov' 40 includeReference=True

Substituting canola oil for corn oil is an easy dietary change for people to make; such a change to the maternal diet may decrease risk for breast cancer in the daughter.Citation: Journal:None, Date:None

The omega-3 fatty acid enriched diet proved to be a safe means for retarding tumor growth and vascularization.Citation: Journal:None, Date:None
